nodes.text: Vermilion was a male bounty hunter who was active during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the resurgent Sith Empire.

In 3640 BBY, he was hired by the Empire to hunt down and eliminate Selonians that served in the resistance during the battle on Corellia. He deployed specially-programmed war droids that are designed to target any Selonian in the area of Coronet City. When Lachei was able to locate the droids' command unit in the tunnels below the shipyards, Vermilion and his unit engaged a Republic strike team who were able to defeat him and end the threat.
